about.title: Some of my work
about.text: After 10 years working in retail merchandising, I recently undertook the adventure of swirching to web developement ! In France we say 'pictures are worthiest than words', so I let you discover some of my projects below. Don't hesitate to contact me, I look forward working with you !

contact.text1: You can contact me via LinkedIn
contact.name: Name

wizard.name: To the modern wizard
wizard.subhead: Creation of an e-commerce site for witches and wizards
wizard.description: This site consists of three pages. The first page is used to generate a new order, with the creation of a unique order number. The second page is used to display all orders already placed, including those contained in the local storage. For orders that have not yet been settled, it is possible to modify or delete the order. And finally the third page allows you to select an unpaid order for collecting it.

drink.name: Drink 3000
drink.subhead: Internet storefront for a custom drink manufacturer
drink.description: Creation of an internet storefont, with filters for the drink selection.

cake.name: Cake 3000
cake.subhead: Internet storefront for a tea shop
cake.description: Creation of an internet storefont, with reservation form.
